lead_paragraph: Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, his facial injuries from a motorcycle crash two months ago apparently healed, has a sprained ligament in his right thumb and is questionable for Pittsburgh’s exhibition game against Minnesota tomorrow night.
snippet: Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, his facial injuries from a motorcycle crash two months ago apparently healed, has a sprained ligament in his right thumb and is questionable for Pittsburgh’s exhibition game against Minnesota tomorrow night.
